title: North Korea launches purported space launch vehicle, South Korea says
description: North Korea has launched purported space launch vehicle, South Korea says

title: Manson follower Leslie Van Houten should be paroled, California appeals court rules
description: A California appeals court says Charles Manson follower Leslie Van Houten should be let out of prison on parole

title: Wildfire on Canada's Atlantic coast spurs evacuation of 16,000 people
description: A wildfire on Canada’s Atlantic coast has damaged about 200 houses and other structures and prompted the evacuation of 16,000 people

title: Chinese jet said to carry out 'aggressive' maneuver in front of US military plane
description: U.S. military releases video of Chinese fighter flying in front of U.S. military plane, Pentagon calls action "aggressive" maneuver and "unprofessional"

title: Woman who threatened Nancy Pelosi with hanging during Capitol riot gets over 2 years in prison
description: A Pennsylvania restaurant owner who screamed death threats directed at then-House Speaker Nancy Pelosi while storming the U.S. Capitol has been sentenced to two years and three months in prison

title: Man, 2 children found dead in Indiana home with high carbon monoxide levels
description: Authorities investigating the deaths of a man and two children in an Indiana home say firefighters detected high carbon monoxide levels inside the residence

title: 11-month-old dies after being left in car while parents went to church: Police
description: An 11-month-old baby girl has died after being left in a car for three hours while her parents attended a Florida church service, police said.

title: Bob Myers departing as Warriors president, GM after 4 NBA titles, 11 seasons
description: Bob Myers is departing as president and general manager of the Golden State Warriors after building a championship team that captured four titles in an eight-year span

title: Fertility doctor accused of using own sperm dies in crash of hand-built plane
description: Authorities say a New York fertility doctor who was accused of using his own sperm to impregnate several patients has died in a plane crash

title: Trial of 'Family Feud' contestant accused of killing wife enters 2nd week
description: Prosecutors say Timothy Bliefnick gained notoriety when he appeared on "Family Feud."

title: Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes reports to prison for defrauding investors
description: Holmes failed in multiple attempts to delay her incarceration.

title: White House truck suspect should be locked up pending trial, DOJ says
description: The man suspected of crashing a truck into the White House bollards should be locked up pending trial, the government says.

title: 4 in 10 restaurant foodborne illness outbreaks caused by sick workers: CDC report
description: A new report published by the CDC Tuesday found that more than 40% of foodborne illness outbreaks at restaurants are caused by sick workers.

title: Former first lady Rosalynn Carter diagnosed with dementia
description: Former first lady Rosalynn Carter has been diagnosed with dementia, The Carter Center announced on Tuesday

title: Several miners feared stuck in Ghana gold mine
description: The illegal miners are believed to have entered the underground mine shaft in search of gold deposits.

title: Minnesota governor readies to sign bill legalizing recreational cannabis
description: Minnesota Democratic Gov. Tim Walz is scheduled to sign a bill Tuesday that legalizes recreational marijuana for people over the age of 21

title: Debt ceiling deal to prevent default faces first big test in key House committee
description: GOP hard-liners on the House Rules Committee have vowed to block the bill.

title: 2 Iranian journalists' trials begin over coverage of woman's death in custody
description: Niloofar Hamedi and Elaheh Mohammadi, who covered the death of Mahsa Amini in police custody, both face charges accusing them of working with the U.S.

title: The easiest way to get a $7.5K tax credit for an electric vehicle? Consider leasing.
description: Thanks to a boost from the government, leasing — not buying — is becoming the most affordable way to get your hands on an electric vehicle

title: AI leaders warn the technology poses 'risk of extinction' like pandemics, nuclear war
description: Hundreds of business heads and public figures sounded a sobering alarm about AI.

title: Small town recognized for historic role in racially integrating baseball in the 1940s
description: The stadium played a largely unheralded role in making historic progress.

title: Artificial intelligence threatens extinction, experts say in new warning
description: Scientists and tech industry leaders have issued a new warning about the perils that artificial intelligence poses to humankind

title: WATCH:  Dog confronts bear entering family kitchen
description: A protective dog named Harper barked at a curious bear that was spotted entering the home through an open door until it ran away.

title: Panel of historians starts 3-year review of 1972 Munich Olympics attack
description: The German government says a panel of historians set up to review the 1972 attack on the Munich Olympics is starting its three-year mission to examine what happened before, during and after the events of five decades ago

title: Millennial Money: 3 signs you may need a credit card hiatus
description: If you’re struggling to keep up with payments or save toward a goal, continuing to use a credit card for all purchases can hinder financial progress

title: German soccer club punished for walking off field after alleged racist slur
description: A lower-level German soccer team called its punishment for stopping a game in protest after racist abuse was apparently directed at team captain Marcus Coffie “a slap in the face.”

title: Tesla's Musk meets Chinese foreign minister
description: China’s foreign minister has met Tesla CEO Elon Musk and said U.S.-Chinese relations require “mutual respect” while touting the promise of the country’s electric vehicle industry

title: Japanese court says government policy against same-sex marriage is unconstitutional
description: A Japanese court has ruled that the government's policy against same-sex marriage is unconstitutional, in a closely watched decision that supporters say is a step toward marriage equality

title: WATCH:  Woman rescued from raging rapids
description: A woman was rescued after she fell into fast-moving rapids while whitewater rafting on the Arkansas River in Colorado.

title: Assailant pours gas on man and lights him on fire after verbal altercation escalated
description: A verbal confrontation at a gas station has left one man in critical condition after an assailant poured gasoline over him and lit him on fire, police say.

title: Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes set to report to prison for defrauding investors
description: Holmes failed in multiple attempts to delay her incarceration.

title: At least 10 dead, 55 injured as bus of Hindu pilgrims falls into gorge in Kashmir
description: At least 10 people died and 55 were injured when a bus carrying Hindu pilgrims skid into a mountain gorge in Indian-controlled Kashmir

title: Drones strike Moscow residential areas, Russian media reports
description: Several drones struck Moscow early on Tuesday, damaging buildings in the Russian capital, according to state media.

title: Prosecutors: Sam Bankman-Fried's arguments to dismiss currency charges are meritless
description: New York prosecutors say Sam Bankman-Fried's lawyers made meritless arguments in a bid to convince a judge to toss out criminal charges alleging that the FTX founder stole from investors in his multibillion dollar cryptocurrency fund

title: DeSantis kicks off presidential campaign in Iowa as he steps up criticism of Trump
description: Ron DeSantis is kicking off his presidential campaign in Iowa at the start of a busy week that will take him to 12 cities in three states as he tests his pitch as the most formidable Republican challenger to former President Donald Trump

title: LGBTQ+ activists call for new strategies to promote equality after Target backlash
description: Activists in the LGBTQ+ community are calling for new ways to mobilize against threats to their long fight for equality

title: China launches new crew for space station, with eye to putting astronauts on moon before 2030
description: China has launched a spacecraft carrying a new three-person crew for its orbiting space station

title: At least 9 shot in boardwalk shooting, police say
description: At least nine people were shot along the Hollywood Beach boardwalk in Florida on Monday night, according to police.

title: Impeachment trial of Texas’ Ken Paxton to begin no later than August 28
description: A historic impeachment trial in Texas to determine whether Republican Attorney General Ken Paxton should be permanently removed from office will begin no later than August in the state Senate

title: WATCH:  America pays tribute to its fallen heroes
description: On this Memorial Day holiday we visit cemeteries across the country to recognize those that sacrificed their lives.
